activities: Employee information is used for business purposes (e.g. administration, safety, benefits, planning, compensation analysis, corporate compliance programs, etc.).  Consumer information is collected when registering for consumer information programs, ordering online or entering a promotion.  Consumer information is also used for processing purchase transaction and is used for fitting consumers for golf products, for research and development purposes and for sending informational messages.  Retailer information is used for order processing and providing dealer locator data to consumers.
contacttitle1: Vice President and Assistant General Counsel
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
